database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Lambert_AP_SWATH_P93_VS5_CDK4_NVP
entry.description: This submission is part of the mass spectrometry datasets for the manuscript by Lambert et al. that describes the use of SWATH to rapidly monitor differential interactomes. This submission contains 16 SWATH runs (biological duplicates for baits CDK4 WT, R24C, R24H and a negative control; each analyzed in the presence or absence of the HSP90 inhibitor NVP-AUY922). One biological replicate for each of these samples was also processed by IDA (8 samples in total). See the README file within "Methods and Protocols" and the accompanying File description. Additional details and files are found on prohits-web.lunenfeld.ca.
